forum.content:
雖然我還沒看過玩命關頭七
但卻先讓我愛上這首歌
送給我那位無緣份的朋友
那段時光很瘋狂很開心
希望妳先在依然如此
I'll tell you all about it when I see you again.

urls.description:
See Wiz on tour this summer http://boysofzummer.com
Get the Furious 7 Soundtrack now http://smarturl
urls.title: Wiz Khalifa - See You Again ft. Charlie Puth [Official Video] Furious 7 Soundtrack

forum.title: 關於那段瘋狂的時光
